titles.title: Supporting and congratulating the people of Serbia on the formation of a new coalition government.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/16/2008--Introduced. Supports: (1) efforts made by Serbian leaders to form a coalition government; (2) continued fostering of pro-western cooperation; and (3) increased defense, economic, and academic cooperation between the United States and Serbia.
